mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cw_third_region_info (id,regionCode,regionName,parentId,parentCodeStr,state, coordinates,systemNo,regionType,remark) VALUES
(#{item.id},#{item.regionCode},#{item.regionName},#{item.parentId},#{item.parentCodeStr}, #{item.state},#{item.coordinates},#{item.systemNo},#{item.regionType},#{item.remark})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regionName=values(regionName), parentCodeStr=values(parentCodeStr), coordinates=values(coordinates), remark = values(remark)
